text:
It only outputs the main objects, like so:
```{"typography":"","tables":"","buttons":"","spacing":"","footer":"","global_colors":"","global_fonts":"","header":"","forms":""}```
not the inner stuff. Any ideas for this <@U26BLKGE4>
Honestly not sure, I don’t _think_ it’s a limitation of the |tojson filter, but it could be. What happens if you print one of the individual dicts, like `{{ theme.typography|tojson }}`?
i have this problem when i try to fetch blogs

It’s a CORS error….

For temporary solution you can use CORS extension but it’s not recommended.
Same, you only get the value if you go to the last object like `theme.global_colors.primary_color`  a bit bummer, but have to just live with that
